### [NEST in R](https://github.com/smweinst/NEST/tree/main/R)
*Installation in R:*  
```{r, include = T, eval = F}
if (!require(devtools)){
  install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("smweinst/NEST")
library(NEST)
```
